nodes.text: Cotellier was a planet in the Rseik sector of the Outer Rim Territories.

Located at the end of the Sanrafsix Corridor, Cotellier was a hot and dry desert world with a deep red color. It was orbited by an emerald green moon which had three rings of ice and rock encircling it. There was very little standing water on the planet, and dust storms frequently ravaged the surface. Nova crystal production was the primary industry of the planet.

Firmus Kett's family carried ore and nova crystals from Cotellier to Kabal through the Sanrafsix Corridor for centuries. Cotellieri Transports Limited joined the Trade Federation following the Bordal Contagion of 214 BBY.
